game_description: UnfoldVR is a VR-first app that has a companion web app, running fully on chain, on IC. We built the tools to empower consumers to create, share and discover 3D content that is built for the Metaverse. With UnfoldVR you can create content using simple-to-use tools that yield great aesthetics and you can list it as discoverable in UnfoldVR. People will browse 3D content jumping from world to world, based on an awesomeness algorithm. You can also customize your lobby space using your 2D or 3D Art.
